description: Best practices for marketing content creation across platforms

instagram.hashtagStrategy: Use 5-10 relevant hashtags, mix popular and niche
instagram.emojiUsage: Strategic emoji placement increases engagement by 48%
instagram.postStructure: Hook in first line, value in middle, CTA at end

facebook.imageImportance: Posts with images get 2.3x more engagement
facebook.videoContent: Native videos get 10x more reach than links
facebook.questions: Posts with questions get 100% more comments

linkedin.engagement: Engage with comments within first hour

email.personalization: Use recipient name in subject line when possible
email.preheaderText: Complement subject line, don't repeat it

general.truthInAdvertising: All claims must be truthful and substantiated
general.socialProof: Include testimonials or statistics when available
general.urgency: Use ethical urgency tactics, avoid false scarcity
general.accessibility: Use clear language, consider all audiences

complianceNotes.ftc: Disclose sponsored content and affiliate relationships
complianceNotes.gdpr: Respect user consent for marketing communications
